Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Well groomed, pretty hard packed and FAST from the rain & warm weather causing it to re-freeze. Good coverage

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Lovely blue sky Spring skiing on the Red and Blue loops today . Surprisingly little wind debris . The trail and groom is holding well.  The skate had a bit of suck : but I had rilled and LF 8 worked well.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 lifts, the Space Worm, and the Rope Tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be groomed today. We are clearing sticks and trees this morning following the wind from last night.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's a cold start to the day, but the sun is out. The wind from last night is calming down and it should continue to lay down as the day goes on. The snow is in very good shape thanks to some extra effort and attention from our Grooming Crew last night and this morning. NASTAR Racing is today from 12:30 to 2:30 PM. There is no NASTAR tomorrow due to the HEAD-2-HEAD race. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with a deli and Espresso Bar until 3:30 PM. Rob Yates will play the Nub's Pub today at 3:30 PM. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM with an hour break at 4:30 PM to groom for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
